pr_title: [CALCITE-3576] Remove enumerable convention check in FilterIntoJoinRule

timeline.bodyText: If NOT_ENUMERABLE is not needed any more, should we also no need to retain the predicate parameter?
timeline.author: chunweilei

replies.bodyText: I guess still need it for backward compatibility, in case some other is still using it.
replies.author: hsyuan

timeline.message: [CALCITE-3576] Remove enumerable convention check in FilterIntoJoinRule

[CALCITE-3576] Remove enumerable convention check in FilterIntoJoinRule

Also tuned nestedloop join cost model to give it some penalty to favor
non-nestedloop joins.

Close #1889
